messages.content: I'm so sorry to hear about your business problems, i hope you are able to rectify them so you may continue your business. Terrible news. We can resume conversations whenever it is best for you, of course.

Hello mike

Sorry for not being able to reply todayð.
I actually had a very big problem at work yesterday.

The craftsman who has been working with me since the brand's launch has decided to go out of business.
It's a matter of life and death for me and my business is in shambles.

Therefore, I would like to take a short break from English conversation with you.

I would like to continue talking with you, so I will definitely resume when things calm down.

Kazuya
Yeah, let's discuss it closer to that date, so i know when i will be awake or asleep.

Hello Mike,
Thank you very much!
How about a restart on August 30?

Hello Kazuya, good to hear from you. That's great news that you have an exhibit in a department store, i hope it brings you lots of new interested customers and business. We can restart when have the time, just let me know!

Hello Mike,
I am sorry I have not been in touch with you for so long. My apologies ð.
I have been busy this month with a POPUPSHOP exhibit at a department store in parallel with my store and it is still ongoing!
How about restarting on the 30th of this month with one every two weeks from now on, if you do not mind, since that event will end on the 22nd and things will calm down a bit?
Hi Mike, Thank you so much! Let's start again next month. Looking forward to talking with you ð

Hello Kazuya, i am glad to hear you made a good deal with your collector. That is great news. So sorry to hear about not feeling well, climate change has done this to us all. Next month works for me, just let me know!

Hello Mike,

Sorry for not being able to contact you this monthð

After returning from London, I was not feeling very well due to jet lag and climate change, and I had a lot of work to do. 

In London I ended up with a good deal with a collector. 
Thank you for all your support ð 
I hope we can start again at the right time!

maybe next month?
